author: Staff Reporter
text:
To enable adolescent girls know their rights, a village-level awareness programme was held at Pudupatti near here.

Organised by the Leaf Society, in association with the NGOs Geneva Global and Freedom Fund, drama artistes were roped in to explain the basic rights of children and how to protect themselves at workplace. They explained the various laws that protect the children in the society.

Adolescent girls who work in textile sector face both physical and mental abuse, and hence they need to be prepared to come out of it. The sensitisation programme was held at many villages in the district and would continue in select villages in the coming days.

S.L. Sathiya Nesan, Director, Leaf Society, elected members of the panchayat, and villagers participated in large numbers.
title: Awareness programme for adolescent girls
